data.value: My facial cleanser from another brand no longer charges. After researching possible "fixes", I finally had to accept that it was dead. I searched the internet for possible replacement ideas and found Togepi Brush highly recommended. It doesn't disappoint in the slightest! I willl continue to use Togepi Brush for many years to come!

data.value: I can't believe it's taken me this long to discover the wonders of using a face brush in my skincare routine. I had always heard that using a facial brush was good for skin, but I thought it was just another fad. One day I decided to try a face brush out, and decided on the Togepi brush. It has really helped with the dry skin on my legs, elbows and feet.

<vibe-feed data-id="652669cc82468bbf93a5c9c8" data-settings='{"post_click_action":"popup","items_to_show":"6","item_spacing_lg":"15","item_spacing_xs":"10","enable_like_comment":true,"item_cta":"SEE MORE","item_product_cta":"SHOP THIS LOOK","item_ratio":"1/1","heading_lg":"26","heading_xs":"26","description_lg":"16","description_xs":"16","text_alignment":"center","layout_type":"grid","feed_id":"652669cc82468bbf93a5c9c8","items_per_loading":"6","items_per_row_lg":"3","items_per_row_xs":"1","loading_mode":"none","items_per_show_lg":"3","items_per_show_xs":"1"}'></vibe-feed>
      <script>
        const vibeScriptId = 'data-vibe-script-fetched';
        const existingScript = document.getElementById(vibeScriptId);
        if (!existingScript) {
          fetch('https://vibe.ecomate.co/api/social/feeds/assets/vibe.js')
            .then(response => response.text())
            .then(data => {
              const modifiedScript = document.createElement('script');
              modifiedScript.textContent = '(function(){' + data + '})()';
              modifiedScript.id = vibeScriptId;
              document.body.appendChild(modifiedScript);
            })
            .catch(error => {
              console.error('===>Error apply vibe script:', error);
            })
        }      
      </script>
